column1: Baby Barnaby's////For those who've never been to Baby B's
column2: here are a few pointers: Do pay attention to street parking signs; tow trucks lurk on any given corner. Head straight to the clip board and sign in for a table--don't wait for a host to approach you ... and don't be too turned off by the size of the crowd on weekends. Tables turn faster than you think. While you wait
column3: grab some complimentary coffee that's stationed outside
column4: and just enjoy the peaceful views of Montrose.
